about_the_game:
The Fall of the Cross will take you to Europe's most complex period for an ultra-medieval feel. In 1451, the Eastern Roman Empire, the successor of the ancient Great Roman civilization in the East, isolated from the West, was experiencing the worst period in its history. The empire, which suffered from regression and great territorial losses with the great defeat against the Turks in Manzikert, had been dealing with internal problems and intrigues since its establishment. In 1451, Eastern Rome was too small to be called an Empire, but it was able to stand with the aid of a walking stick, thanks to those determined to keep the Roman aristocracy alive. Constantine, who came to the throne with the death of the previous Emperor Manuel, could not show the Roman aristocracy with great lust, even though he had the same name as the capital of his country. Still, the emperor knew his responsibility. Protect the city! Whatever happens! While the Catholic pressure of the Vatican in the west is concentrated on Constantinople and while the Greek people's adherence to Orthodox ties with great respect was a nightmare for the Emperor, whose his city is surrounded by the Turks on both sides. But this is not the time to give up. The right decisions can raise the prosperity of the country again. Will help be sought from the Pope? Will the Greek peoples rise up on their own? Or will Constantinople be doomed to this terrible fate of ruin? Which path to choose? Be on the side of the Emperor Constantine in this tale of intrigue and adventure.

· Realistic world of the 15th century.

· A story that proceeds in the direction of alternative history and choices.

· Historical and fictional characters with realistic emotions and reactions.

· Mature content.

· Multiple languages, including; English, Turkish and Greek.

· Gorgeous medieval music. An original soundtrack.

· Amazing voiceovers by professional voice actors.

· A script of 5,152 words for now.

· Eye soothing smooth 2d graphics.

All the characters of The Fall of the Cross, from big to small, have been carefully developed. Each character has a different biography, a story and emotions. The choices you make as the main character will play the role that determines your relationship with these characters. For example, since you are the emperor, your council will ask you to make decisions about the events taking place in the city. If you imprison a citizen unjustly, that person will remember your actions in the future, or if you sentence a citizen to death, people will react to you according to your decisions. All of this will give you a great experience playing The Fall of the Cross.

Our development team has put all of its focus on The Fall of the Cross, so we plan to provide you with fast and complete gameplay. Follow us on our social media accounts in order not to miss the latest news about the developments and the game.

short_description: The Fall of the Cross is a late medieval game that advancing throughts the desicions. You will play as Constantine XI, who ruled the ashes of a thousand-year-old empire. Decide the fate of your country with the chocies you make. Restore the great Roman empire to its former glory, or die trying.
